choices: Someone started getting sore in the muscles
Found a prop they don't remember getting
1.content: Gavin and Dan have been prepping for today's filming for the last few days gathering props, coming up with ideas and the like until...
1.title: An interesting Filming Session

info.brief_description: Gavin and or Dan end up having a fascinating filming session on day.
info.description:
Finally can make this interactive story!

Some rules.
         Stick to Gavin and Dan
         can be magical, scientific, semi-realistic, realistic but if instantly please make it interesting and detailed.
         can be gay but no scat, please

Otherwise, have fun on this passion project
